author: jukka
msg: Use segments also in ItemStateReferenceCache to make synchronization more fine-grained

author: jukka
msg: It's better to allow the occasional cache overwrite than to block concurrent threads. The locking in SessionState and SISM already prevent concurrent read/write operations that could possibly lead to inconsistencies.

msg: o Fixed the tests on the running OS.
